data.name: Knight of the Deep
data.detailed_description:
Knight of the Deep is a 2D action-adventure focused on exploration, combat and puzzle-solving. It combines underwater traversal and out of water platforming.

Lore

As a wandering fish, you find yourself inside an ocean cave full of predators. While you anxiously try to find your way out, you discover a mysterious sword. As you pick it up, you feel its power flow through your veins, filling you with courage that sends you venturing deeper into the abyss. There you find a hidden world with wary creatures. They speak of an oppression that looms, which threaten their once blossoming kingdom.

Key Features

  • Explore a massive interconnected ocean world.
  • Face enemies and bosses that threaten the kingdom.
  • Acquire new weapons, items, and abilities as you progress.
  • Help other sea critters by completing quests.
  • Overcome puzzling challenges along the way.
  • Fun mini-games and extras.
  • Cute pixel art and original soundtrack.
  • Full controller support.

data.short_description: Play as a sword-wielding fish tasked with saving the kingdom. Explore the depths of an ocean world full of adorable characters, menacing foes, and hidden wonders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks - 10.9.5 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
